sql.query:
SELECT user_fname, user_mobile, user_tpin, scheme_id, balance_amt, created_by AS retailer_creator_id
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, m_commission.operator_id
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS mop ON (mop.id = m_commission.operator_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = mop.service_id)
WHERE m_commission.scheme_id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND m_commission.is_active = 1 AND mop.max_amount = '1000' AND ms.service_name = :P2 /* {{'Money'}} */

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, m_commission.operator_id
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS mop ON (mop.id = m_commission.operator_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = mop.service_id)
WHERE m_commission.scheme_id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND m_commission.is_active = 1 AND mop.max_amount = '2000' AND ms.service_name = :P2 /* {{'Money'}} */

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, m_commission.operator_id
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS mop ON (mop.id = m_commission.operator_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = mop.service_id)
WHERE m_commission.scheme_id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND m_commission.is_active = 1 AND mop.max_amount = '3000' AND ms.service_name = :P2 /* {{'Money'}} */

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, m_commission.operator_id
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS mop ON (mop.id = m_commission.operator_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = mop.service_id)
WHERE m_commission.scheme_id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND m_commission.is_active = 1 AND mop.max_amount = '4000' AND ms.service_name = :P2 /* {{'Money'}} */

SELECT m_commission.comm_per, m_commission.comm_val, m_commission.service_charge_per, m_commission.service_charge_val, m_commission.operator_id
FROM m_commission
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS mop ON (mop.id = m_commission.operator_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS ms ON (ms.id = mop.service_id)
WHERE m_commission.scheme_id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.scheme_id}} */ AND m_commission.is_active = 1 AND mop.max_amount = '5000' AND ms.service_name = :P2 /* {{'Money'}} */

SELECT id AS admin_id, user_id AS admin_user_id, user_fname AS admin_username, user_mobile AS admin_mobile, user_email AS admin_email, balance_amt AS admin_balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type = 0

SELECT user_fname AS rt_creator_user_name, user_mobile AS rt_creator_user_mobile, user_email AS rt_creator_user_email, user_type AS rt_creator_user_type, balance_amt AS rt_creator_balance_amt, scheme_id AS rt_creator_scheme_id, created_by AS dt_creator_id
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.retailer_creator_id}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT t_op_api_rel.api_code1, t_op_api_rel.api_code2, t_op_api_rel.api_code3, t_op_api_rel.api_code4, t_op_api_rel.api_code5, t_op_api_rel.api_code6, t_op_api_rel.api_code7, t_op_api_rel.api_code8, m_api_fwd.service_id, m_api_fwd.api_id, m_api.api_name, m_api.api_code, m_api.username, m_api.api_password
FROM t_op_api_rel
LEFT JOIN m_api_forward AS m_api_fwd ON (m_api_fwd.operator_id = t_op_api_rel.op_id) LEFT JOIN m_api AS m_api ON (m_api.id = m_api_fwd.api_id)
WHERE t_op_api_rel.op_id = :P1 /* {{GetCommision.operator_id}} */ AND m_api.status = 1

options.data: You do not have sufficient wallet balance!
